function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of temperature monitoring for employees","Impact":"Failure to detect early signs of illness in employees","Mitigation":"Implement regular temperature checks for employees","Technologies":"Thermometers, thermal cameras","People":"Employees, employers","Owner":"Employers"},{"Description":"Poor workplace hygiene and sanitation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in the workplace","Mitigation":"Enforce strict hygiene and sanitation measures in the workplace","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, hand sanitizers, cleaning supplies","People":"Employees, employers","Owner":"Health and safety agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to health and safety guidelines","Impact":"Increased risk of workplace hazards and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure strict adherence to health and safety guidelines set by agencies such as CDC and CCR","Technologies":"Training programs, signage, monitoring systems","People":"Employees, employers","Owner":"Employers"}]}
